name: Skt. Petri
description: Located in Copenhagen’s old Latin Quarter, this stylish hotel offers free WiFi, and designer rooms. Just 4 minutes’ walk away is the main shopping street, Strøget. Air conditioning, flat-screen TV and parquet flooring are featured in all Hotel Skt Petri rooms. Some rooms have a balcony or a terrace. The restaurant and bar are located right in the buzzing centre of the hotel lobby, serving creative culinary bites and signature drinks. The surrounding area is full of shops, restaurants and cafés. A local bus stops directly outside and connects to Tivoli Gardens in 10 minutes.

name: Radisson Collection Royal Hotel, Copenhagen
description: Set in the heart of the city, Radisson Collection Royal Hotel Copenhagen provides easy access to Copenhagen's main sightseeing and retail areas. It is also set within a five-minute walk of Tivoli Gardens. Guests of this 5-star hotel can plan excursions with the assistance of the tour desk. The 24-hour reception provides services such as car rentals and luggage storage, and on-site parking is also available. Rooms at Radisson Collection Royal Hotel Copenhagen provide a stylish space to unwind, complete with a mini bar. After settling in to their room, guests can discover the area with use of Copenhagen Central Station, which is a short stroll from the hotel. Radisson Collection Royal Hotel Copenhagen features a conveniently located café, ideal for those wanting a meal without leaving the property. Lunch and dinner are available daily at Café Royal. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and restaurants in the vicinity. The hotel is a short stroll from Vesterport Station, allowing for convenient access in and around Copenhagen. Church of Our Lady, Christiansborg Palace and University of Copenhagen are a short walk away.Revato

name: Scandic Falkoner
description: Located in Copenhagen, Scandic Falkoner provides complimentary wireless internet and a gym. It offers 4-star accommodation with air-conditioned rooms. There are a variety of amenities available to guests of the hotel, including a coffee bar, a ballroom and meeting facilities. The front desk operates around the clock and the friendly staff can suggest sights to visit and provide other tourist information. Rooms at Scandic Falkoner are comfortable and feature ironing facilities and a flat-screen TV. After settling in to their room, guests can discover the area with use of Frederiksberg Metro Station, which is a short walk from the hotel. Those staying at Scandic Falkoner can relax at the in-house bar, ideally based for socialising in the evening. Scandic Falkoner is within walking distance of Royal Danish Horticultural Society's Garden, Frederiksberg Park and Frederiksberg Alle. The hotel also offers parking for guests with a vehicle.Revato

name: Scandic Kødbyen
description: Scandic Kodbyen offers a comfortable setting when in Copenhagen. Guests can also enjoy complimentary wireless internet. This 4-star hotel offers bicycle rental, meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception. It is pet-friendly and has private parking on site for those with a car. Scandic Kodbyen has 370 rooms that are filled with everything necessary for a comfortable stay. Each provides a private bathroom with a hair dryer. Guests staying at the hotel can sit down to a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, conveniently situated for those who want to stay close by at mealtime. Copenhagen's attractions, such as Oksnehallen and the Det Ny Theater, are within easy walking distance of Scandic Kodbyen. Tivoli Gardens and Kobenhavns Radhus are also found within a 20-minute walk away.Revato

name: Comwell Copenhagen Portside Dolce by Wyndham
description: Comwell Copenhagen Portside Dolce by Wyndham has a fitness centre, garden, a shared lounge and restaurant in Copenhagen. Featuring a bar, the 4-star hotel has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. The accommodation features room service, a 24-hour front desk and luggage storage for guests. All rooms at the hotel are fitted with a seating area and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. At Comwell Copenhagen Portside Dolce by Wyndham the rooms include bed linen and towels. The accommodation offers a buffet or continental breakfast. Comwell Copenhagen Portside Dolce by Wyndham offers a sun terrace. Guests can make use of the business centre or relax in the snack bar. Svanemolle Beach is 2 km from the hotel, while Parken Stadium is 2.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 11 km from Comwell Copenhagen Portside Dolce by Wyndham.

name: 25hours Hotel Indre By
description: In the heart of the Scandinavian metropolis, the 25hours Hotel Indre By has found its home. Centrally located between the Round Tower and the Kobmagergade shopping street, 243 rooms are waiting to be explored. Room categories range from Small to Gigantic and offer a retreat to suit every traveller and their needs. The NENI restaurant and Café Duse are the perfect places to socialise for hotel guests and locals alike, and the Boilerman Bar in the basement is ideal for relaxed evenings.accorhotels.com

name: Hotel Danmark by Brøchner Hotels
description: Featuring panoramic city views from the rooftop terrace, this central Copenhagen hotel sits between the National Museum of Copenhagen and Copenhagen City Hall Square. A complimentary wine hour between 17:00-18:00 is offered daily to guests at the lobby bar. Hotel Danmark by Brøchner Hotels’s rooms are housed in 2 different buildings, and one of which dates back to 1792 and is now a protected listing. Large windows, a writing desk and cable TV come standard. The mornings can begin with the hotel's organic breakfast. Later on, guests can relax in the hotel's own urban garden after a busy day in the city. Restaurant Tivolihallen features Danish sandwiches with a modern twist as well as an a la carte menu. Pubs, cafes and restaurants are within walking distance. Stroget High Street is 300 metres away. Copenhagen Central Station is 700 metres away from Hotel Danmark by Brøchner Hotels.

name: Tivoli Hotel
address: Arni Magnussons Gade 2, 1577 Copenhagen, Capital Region
description: Featuring a sauna, a swimming pool and free wireless internet access in all areas, Tivoli Hotel Copenhagen is situated in Copenhagen and offers trendy accommodation. It features city views and 4-star rooms. Guests can make the most of the outdoors on the terrace or have a beverage at the lounge bar. For those travelling with children Tivoli Hotel Copenhagen offers babysitting/child services, a playground and a kids club. This hotel provides rooms with an en suite bathroom, air conditioning and a TV. They all have tea and coffee making facilities, a mini bar and a laptop safe. Tivoli Hotel boasts convenient dining options, including international and local cuisines at Tivoli Brasserie and local food at MASH Penthouse. Each evening, guests are able to relax in the comfortable lounge bar. Tivoli Hotel is close to shops, dining and Copenhagen's nightlife. It is also within walking distance of the Ny Carlsberg Glyptotek, Daemonen and Tivoli Gardens.Revato

name: Grand Joanne
description: This city centre hotel is 200 metres from Tivoli Gardens and 5 minutes' walk from City Hall Square. It offers bright rooms with free Wi-Fi and a flat-screen TV with cable channels. All the tastefully decorated rooms at Grand Joanne have a work desk and a private bathroom with bath or shower. The Strøget shopping street is a 5-minute walk from the hotel. Copenhagen Central Station is 200 metres away and offers easy access to Copenhagen International Airport by train.

name: Phoenix Copenhagen
description: Conveniently located in the middle of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an ideal base in Copenhagen. It is situated in the area's vibrant nightlife district, which is only a few minutes walk from Kongens Nytorv. There are a variety of facilities at Phoenix Copenhagen on offer to guests, including massage services, free Wi-Fi and a gym. Couples will enjoy the hotel's features like vip rooms and honeymoon suites. Rooms at Hotel Phoenix Copenhagen provide a stylish space to relax, complete with a flat-screen TV and a mini bar. They all offer a desk, an in-room safe and a private bathroom. Guests can wake up to a satisfying breakfast served each morning, before venturing out from Hotel Phoenix Copenhagen Denmark to discover the local area. Phoenix Bredgade 37 Copenhagen is ideally located for exploring Copenhagen with Nyhavn within a 10-minute walk. Maersk, Rundetaarn and Holmen are also situated within a 20-minute walk away.Revato

name: Hotel Kong Arthur
description: Located by the city lakes in central Copenhagen, this eco-friendly hotel offers a Nordic-style breakfast buffet featuring organic foods. WiFi is free. The on-site Ni'Mat Spa has a sauna, hot tub and relaxation area. Dating back to 1882, Hotel Kong Arthur now offers stylish, modern rooms with wooden floors and cable TV. Minibars and tea/coffee facilities are also standard. In-house dining includes Italian cuisine at La Rocca, Spanish tapas at Pintxos and Japanese-inspired dishes at Sticks'n'Sushi. The 24-hour bar offers espressos, drinks and snacks. Within 10 minutes’ walk is Nørreport Station, which is a 15-minute ride from Copenhagen Airport. Tivoli Gardens and the main shopping street, Strøget, are a 15-minute walk away.

name: Copenhagen Marriott Hotel
description: Experience a luxury getaway at Copenhagen Marriott Hotel, one of the finest modern hotels in Denmark. Discover spacious, beautifully appointed hotel rooms that rank among some of the largest in Copenhagen, Denmark. Each is a downtown oasis with complimentary Wi-Fi access, a sleek marble bathroom, flat-screen TV and floor-to-ceiling windows that showcase mesmerizing views of the Copenhagen city center. Indulge in international cuisine and captivating harbor views from our restaurants and bars, including a beautiful outdoor terrace. Host impressive business meetings and conferences in our modern, canal-view venues. With a picturesque waterfront location in Copenhagen city center, we're near Tivoli Gardens, Harbor Beach, and famed Stroget Street. The Copenhagen Marriott Hotel provides an ideal backdrop for business and leisure guests alike.Marriott

name: Crowne Plaza Copenhagen Towers
description: Stay at our sustainable, high-end hotel near Bella Center conference venue, with 24-hour transport links to central Copenhagen. Conveniently located off the E20 motorway, Crowne Plaza® Copenhagen Towers hotel offers easy access to central Copenhagen and to Malmö in Sweden. It's a short walk to Ørestad train and metro station. We are located 7 km from Copenhagen Airport, and we offer secure parking. Copenhagen’s popular visitor attractions, such as Tivoli Gardens, the world-famous Little Mermaid, and Copenhagen Zoo, can be reached with ease. Take a leisurely canal cruise or sample some Danish lager at the Carlsberg Brewery. Field’s, Denmark’s largest shopping mall, is next door to the hotel. We offer a 24-hour Business Centre, 21 meeting rooms and a dedicated and professional staff. Our accommodations offer free WiFi throughout the hotel, and each room is equipped with Scandinavian design furniture, TV, air-condition, and spacious bathrooms. Our sustainable hotel includes solar panels and groundwater-based cooling. Enjoy a relaxing cocktail followed by organic Nordic cuisine in our innovative restaurant and bar, Bark, which is located in our stunning "green" atrium.IHG Hotels & Resorts

name: Hotel SP34 by Brøchner Hotels
address: Sankt Peders Stræde 34, 1453 Copenhagen, Capital Region
description: Featuring a breakfast buffet of organic food and ingredients, this modern boutique hotel is 300 metres from City Hall Square and Copenhagen’s pedestrian street, Strøget. It features free WiFi, a rooftop terrace and 2 restaurants. All rooms at Hotel SP34 by Brøchner Hotels have tea/coffee facilities and a large, flat-screen TV with WiFi connectivity. Designer wooden furnishings and quality Ren Clean Skincare toiletries are also standard. Suites include a free minibar with soft drinks. Complimentary wine can be enjoyed between 17:00 and 18:00 every day. Cock's and Cows serves upscale burgers made from homemade ingredients, while Restaurant Väkst offers Nordic-style dining in an urban garden setting. Vintage clothing shops, trendy restaurants and a wide selection of cafés and bars are easily accessed. Tivoli Gardens is an 8-minute walk away.

name: Scandic Copenhagen
description: Centrally situated, Scandic Copenhagen offers easy access to Copenhagen's best sightseeing areas. It provides free Wi-Fi, a sauna and an express check-in and check-out feature. This 4-star hotel offers meeting rooms, massage services and a 24-hour reception. Guests can exercise in the fitness centre, or borrow a bicycle and explore the surrounding area. Scandic Copenhagen offers rooms equipped with a shower, cable/satellite channels and a hair dryer. They are all soundproofed and include a seating area, a private bathroom and an in-room safe. Scandic Copenhagen houses both a restaurant and a bar where guests can unwind at the end of the day. For those preferring to dine out, the local area features several bars and restaurants with a range of different cuisines. Located within walking distance of Copenhagen Central Station, the hotel has a tour desk with information on what to see in Copenhagen. The surrounding area is also well known for its shopping.Revato

name: Scandic Spectrum
description: Within a 20-minute stroll from Copenhagen Central Station, Scandic Spectrum provides guests with a convenient base when visiting Copenhagen. It is conveniently located in the city centre. Deluxe on-site facilities include a sauna and a swimming pool. Wi-Fi is also available. The rooms are air conditioned and include bottled water. Copenhagen's attractions, such as the Black Diamond and the Royal Danish Library, are easily accessible on foot from the hotel. Christiansborg Palace, Kobenhavns Radhus and Tivoli Gardens are each within walking distance.Revato

name: Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel, Copenhagen
description: Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel Copenhagen provides modern 4-star accommodation in Copenhagen. It has on-site parking and is close to restaurants and shops. This elegant hotel provides a number of amenities, including supervised child care/activities, a concierge and a 24-hour reception. There is also disabled parking for guests travelling with a car. Guests staying at Radisson Blu Scandinavia can relax in their stylish rooms that offer a private bathroom, a mini bar and movies-on-demand. They all include a desk, a radio and an in-room safe. Guests looking to sit down to a meal and wanting to stay nearby needn't look any further than Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel's on-site restaurant, which is ideally open each day for dinner. Radisson Blu Scandinavia Hotel Copenhagen is surrounded by the area's well-known tourist attractions, including the Royal Danish Library, the Black Diamond and Christianshavn, which are a short walk away. It is also within walking distance of The Crystal and Christian IV's Brewhouse.Revato

name: Scandic Sydhavnen
description: Situated only a five-minute stroll from Sydhavn Railway Station, Scandic Sydhavnen offers guests an ideal base while visiting Copenhagen. In addition to free private parking on site, the hotel features comfortable 4-star rooms and a bar. There are a variety of amenities at Scandic Sydhavnen that guests can enjoy, including a sauna, free Wi-Fi and a fitness centre. The hotel's amenities, such as business centre and photocopier, kids club and playground, and honeymoon suites make this an ideal choice for business travellers, families and couples alike. The rooms at Scandic Sydhavnen feature a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom and a desk. They provide an alarm clock, heating and ironing facilities. Those staying at Scandic Sydhavnen can sit down to a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by when looking for a bite to eat. Copenhagen Airport is around a 15-minute car trip from the hotel and Enghave Railway Station is within walking distance. It is also a brief car ride from Tivoli Gardens, University of Copenhagen and Nyhavn.Revato

name: Profilhotels Copenhagen Plaza
description: Since 1914, when it opened its doors for the first time, Profilhotels Plaza has been a favorite among travelers who appreciate a hotel that has both soul and history. The hotel is located opposite Tivoli and Copenhagen Central Station. There is a cozy and enchanting atmosphere with impressive architecture, original interiors that carry the memories of past guests which are immortalized on our plaque in the lobby. The accommodation offers facilities for both holidaymakers and business travellers. The staff is ready to help with recommendations for what you can experience in Copenhagen. There is a restaurant, bar and conference rooms, which ensures a pleasant and convenient stay for all guests. Guests can relax in our Library bar which is furnished with Chesterfield furniture and dark wood paneling creating a Victorian gentlemen's room atmosphere as a time bubble back to 19th century style. Here, sumptuous drinks are served to the sound of live jazz music. Restaurant Angelini offers dishes inspired by Italian-American cuisine. There are 92 rooms, including 4 exquisite junior suites with their own terrace and a view of Tivoli Gardens. There is the possibility of accommodation that can meet all wishes. Comfort is the focus to ensure our guests have a unique experience. Before you set out to explore all the wonders of Copenhagen, you can enjoy Profilhotels Copenhagen Plaza's varied breakfast and recharge for an unforgettable day in the city. A good hotel experience ends with a good and nutritious breakfast.

name: Imperial Hotel
description: Conveniently located in the centre of the city, this 4-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Copenhagen. It is close to Tivoli Gardens, shops and nightlife options. This modern hotel offers massage services, meeting rooms and a 24-hour reception. Also on offer to guests are bicycle rental, room service and a car rental desk. Imperial Hotel Copenhagen features 288 rooms that are equipped with everything necessary for a comfortable stay. The hotel also has several connecting rooms to accommodate families. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal spot to enjoy a meal. Each evening, guests are welcome to enjoy a drink in the comfortable lounge bar. Additionally, the hotel offers a daily buffet breakfast. Hotel Imperial is ideally located for sightseeing in Copenhagen with City Hall Square, Kobenhavns Radhus and Copenhagen City Hall within walking distance. Vesterport Station is right nearby, connecting guests with the local area.Revato

name: Scandic Palace Hotel
description: Located in Copenhagen, Scandic Palace Hotel offers stylish, 4-star accommodation close to Kobenhavns Radhus. This unique hotel is set in the heart of the city. Guests can soak up the sun on the terrace or have a drink at the bar. Amenities include complimentary Wi-Fi and an express check-in and check-out feature. Guests staying at Scandic Palace Hotel can relax in their stylish rooms that feature a flat-screen TV, a mini bar and an in-room safe. They are also fitted with ironing facilities and a hair dryer. In-house dining options include a restaurant, which is a convenient spot to enjoy a meal. Breakfast is available each morning and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. Guests are also able to try one of the various bars and restaurants nearby. The hotel is ideally situated for sightseeing in Copenhagen with Tivoli Gardens, University of Copenhagen and Church of Our Lady within a 10-minute walk. Rundetaarn and Christiansborg Palace are within walking a distance.Revato

name: Scandic Cph Strandpark
description: Situated in Copenhagen, 1.3 km from Kastrup Søbad Beach, Scandic CPH Strandpark features accommodation with a fitness centre, private parking, a terrace and a restaurant. Featuring a bar, the property is located within 1.7 km of Amager Strandpark. The accommodation offers a 24-hour front desk, airport transfers, luggage storage space and free WiFi. At the hotel, the rooms have air conditioning and a flat-screen TV. A buffet, vegetarian or gluten-free breakfast can be enjoyed at the property. Church of Our Saviour is 6.6 km from Scandic CPH Strandpark, while Christiansborg Palace is 7.3 km from the property. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 1 km from the accommodation.

name: Stay Seaport
description: Located just 10 minutes' walk from Nordhavn train station, STAY Seaport is set in the North Harbor district of Copenhagen, 2 km from Parken Stadium and Fælledparken Park. Nyhavn is 3 km away. Free WiFi is featured throughout the apartment. All apartments feature a seating area with a 55-inch flat-screen TV and cable channels. There is also a full kitchen, fitted with a dishwasher, oven and fridge. Each unit features a private bathroom with a shower, free toiletries, and a hairdryer. Bed linen is available. A fitness centre is available in the same building. Bicycles can be hired at the reception. The Little Mermaid statue and Langelinie are about 2.5 km from STAY Seaport. Copenhagen Kastrup Airport is 12 km from the property.

name: AC Hotel by Marriott Bella Sky Copenhagen
description: Experience 4-star sophistication in Denmark's capital city with the beautifully-designed accommodations and deluxe amenities at AC Hotel Bella Sky Copenhagen. Boasting a location near the airport and the vibrant city center, our hotel is steps away from the train station which allows for easy exploration of local attractions including Tivoli Gardens and Amager Common. Unpack your bags in modern hotel rooms with pillow top bedding, floor-to-ceiling windows and authentic Danish design. Then explore our hotel's luxurious amenities, including a fitness center and delicious restaurants. Start your day with the hot breakfast buffet and savor locally-sourced fare for lunch or dinner. If visiting Copenhagen for business, plan your next successful event in the adjacent Bella Center and tackle projects with our hotel's complimentary Wi-Fi, parking and on-site business center. We're ready to make your visit memorable at AC Hotel Bella Sky Copenhagen.Marriott

name: Comfort Hotel Vesterbro
description: Get rested and ready for anything at the pet-friendly Comfort Inn Vesterbro hotel in Copenhagen, DK near the Tivoli Gardens. Our smoke-free hotel is near attractions like the Copenhagen Zoo, Copenhagen Airport and Copenhagen University. Enjoy hotel amenities such as a restaurant and lounge, coffee bar, indoor parking and guest laundry facilities, to name a few. Guest rooms come with free WiFi and more. Behind every great day is a great night at the Comfort Hotel Vesterbro. Book now.Choice Hotels

name: Clarion Hotel Copenhagen Airport
description: Life is better when you get together at the non-smoking Clarion Hotel Copenhagen Airport. We are located at Terminal 3 of the Copenhagen Airport, making it easy to take in attractions like Tivoli Gardens, the Little Mermaid Statue, Amager Strandpark and Nyhavn. We offer 29 meeting rooms that can accommodate up to 500 people, free WiFi, a fitness center, spa and steam bath, business center and indoor pool. Some of our contemporary and modern rooms have floor-to-ceiling windows and separate sitting areas.Choice Hotels

name: Scandic Front
address: Sankt Annæ Plads 21, 1250 Copenhagen, Capital Region
description: Situated in Copenhagen, Scandic Front provides stylish, 4-star accommodation close to Nyhavn. It is conveniently located in the city centre. Offering views of the Copenhagen Opera House, the hotel is a convenient place to stay for those wanting to scope out popular attractions in Copenhagen. For trendy travellers a lounge bar provides a hip setting for an after-meal drink. It also offers free Wi-Fi, meeting rooms and a sauna. Every room at Scandic Front provides a private bathroom and all the essentials for a comfortable stay. All provide a seating area, a flat-screen TV and an in-room safe. On-site dining options include a restaurant, which is an ideal place to enjoy a meal. In the evening, guests are welcome to relax in the cosy lounge bar. Guests can also try one of the many bars and cafés in the vicinity. The hotel is close to Kongens Nytorv Metro Station, making it easy for guests to explore Copenhagen and its surrounding areas. Guests can also visit Holmen, Maersk and Christianshavn.Revato

name: Ibsens Hotel
description: Situated in the lively Nansengade area of Copenhagen, within 3 minutes’ walk of the Botanical Gardens and Nørreport Metro and Train Station, this family-run boutique hotel offers an outdoor terrace and free WiFi. Torvehallerne Food Market is 300 metres away. Each room at Ibsens Hotel includes a writing desk and cable TV, while some have a seating area. Italian cuisine is served at La Rocca, while Spanish tapas are available at the Pintxos. In summer, guests can enjoy an espresso or chilled beer out on the terrace. The Nordic-style breakfast features local and organic foods. The spa Ni'mat, located next door, offers bookable treatments. Copenhagen University and the Round Tower are within a 10-minute walk from Ibsens Hotel. Tivoli Gardens is 1.5 km away. Copenhagen Airport is just 15-minutes away by metro.

name: Villa Copenhagen
description: Villa Copenhagen has a fitness centre, garden, a terrace and restaurant in Copenhagen. This 5-star hotel offers room service, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi. The accommodation offers a business centre, a concierge service and currency exchange for guests. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a wardrobe, a coffee machine, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV and a private bathroom with a shower. At Villa Copenhagen the rooms are equipped with bed linen and towels. A gluten-free breakfast is available every morning at the accommodation. Popular points of interest near Villa Copenhagen include Tivoli Gardens, Ny Carlsberg Glyptotek and Copenhagen Central Station. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 7 km from the hotel.

name: Profilhotels Mercur
description: Next to Vesterport Station in central Copenhagen, this hotel offers a tennis court and free high-speed WiFi. Each room has a 32-inch Smart TV with satellite channels, games and weather information. Tea/coffee facilities, modern decor and a bathroom with shower are standard at Mercur Hotel. After a day of sightseeing in Copenhagen, Mercur’s bar is an ideal place to relax and chat with other guests. The hotel reception is open around the clock. Mercur Hotel’s central location provides easy access to shopping, dining and culture. The City Hall Square, Tivoli Gardens Amusement Park and Copenhagen Central Station are all about 5 minutes’ walk away. Featuring an outdoor tennis court, Profilhotels Mercur is set in Copenhagen center 200 meters from Tivoli Garden and Copenhagen Central Station. The accommodation offers facilities for both holidaymakers and business travelers. The staff is ready to help with recommendations for what you can experience in Copenhagen. The hotel is located 5 minutes’ walk from the City Hall, Rådhuspladsen and the walking shopping district, Strøget. There are 119 rooms, including 11 exquisite rooms on first floor that are spacious and can have up to 6 beds made up. There is the possibility of accommodation that can meet all wishes. All rooms have flatscreen TV, Coffee and Tea facilities, private bathroom and free high-speed WiFi. Comfort is the focus to ensure our guests have a unique experience. Before you set out to explore all the wonders of Copenhagen, you can enjoy the hotels varied breakfast and recharge for an unforgettable day in the city. A good hotel experience ends with a good and nutritious breakfast.

name: Comfort Hotel Copenhagen Airport
description: Our pet-friendly Comfort Hotel Copenhagen Airport offers a memorable experience through full-service and superior facilities. Amenities include free WiFi, free full breakfast, a barception, a fitness center and meeting space. Guest rooms feature flat-screen TVs, coffee makers and premium bedding. Our unpretentious hotel is conveniently located at the Copenhagen Airport Terminal Complex at Terminal 3, making it simple to fly in and out of the city. Nearby attractions include the Tivoli Gardens, Stroeget, Little Mermaid statue and more. We also provide connection to the railway station that will connect you to Copenhagen and Malmo, Sweden. Make the most of your time when you book a guest room at our hotel in Kastrup, Denmark.Choice Hotels

name: Best Western Plus Park Globetrotter Copenhagen Airport
description: This hotel lies next to Femøren Metro Station, 10 minutes’ ride from central Copenhagen and 3 minutes’ ride from Copenhagen Airport. It offers sauna and indoor pool access. Park Inn Copenhagen Airport’s rooms have a flat-screen TV with cable channels. Some rooms have a tea/coffee maker. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the hotel. Facilities include a solarium, a billiards room and a summer playroom. Brasserie Salt & Pepper offers both Scandinavian and international cuisine. Breakfast is served from 06:00. Park Inn by Radisson Copenhagen Airport is 200 metres from Amager Strand and the Øresund Strait. Field’s shopping centre is also nearby.

name: Charlottehaven
description: Located in Østerbro district in Copenhagen, Charlottehaven offers fully furnished, serviced apartments. This aparthotel features an on-site café, a well-equipped fitness centre and a 24-hour front desk. Free WiFi and parking are available. Charlottehaven modern apartments come with a private balcony, fully equipped kitchen and a spacious bathroom. The kitchen includes a microwave, dishwasher and coffee/tea facilities. A washing machine and tumble dryer are also included in each apartment. The on-site café is open for breakfast, lunch and dinner and serves a variety of modern dishes. During warm weather, guests can enjoy a glass of wine or a refreshing smoothie out on the terrace or in the garden. Guests can stay active and enjoy free access to the fitness centre, which includes a swimming pool, sauna and squash court. A variety of exercise classes are offered, such as spinning, yoga and zumba. Bicycle rental is available and central Copenhagen can be reached in 10 minutes by bike. Nordhavn Station is a 2-minute walk away which offers connections to Copenhagen Kastrup Airport in just 30 minutes. The sandy beach Svanemølle is just a 10-minute walk from Charlottehaven.

name: Hotel Østerport
description: Strategically located in the middle of the city, this 3-star hotel makes for an excellent base in Copenhagen. It is ideally positioned for guests wanting to discover the area's attractions. This modern hotel provides bicycle rental, meeting rooms and conference rooms. Additionally, the multilingual staff are on hand to offer assistance. Every room at Hotel Osterport provides a flat-screen TV and all the essentials for a comfortable stay. All offer a radio, heating and a telephone. Guests staying at Hotel Osterport can sit down to a unique dining experience at the on-site restaurant, conveniently based for those who want to stay close by for a meal. In the evening, guests can relax in the comfortable lounge bar. In addition, the hotel provides a daily buffet breakfast. Hotel Osterport is close to Osterport Station, making it easy for guests to explore Copenhagen and its surrounding areas. The hotel is also located near the area's well-known clubs and pubs, plus Danske Statsbaner, Maersk and The Little Mermaid are a 20-minute stroll away.Revato

name: Copenhagen Island Hotel
description: Situated in Copenhagen, this 4-star property is modern and stylish. The air-conditioned rooms are equipped with plasma TVs and free Wi-Fi. This unique hotel provides a sauna, an express check-in and check-out feature and meeting rooms. Welcoming and helpful team members are available 24 hours a day. Those staying at Copenhagen Island Hotel can relax in their stylish rooms that feature tea and coffee making facilities, an in-room safe and a mini bar. They all offer a desk, a radio and a telephone. Copenhagen Island's on-site restaurant provides international-inspired dishes, which can enjoyed on the terrace. Breakfast is available daily and can be savoured in the comfort of the rooms. The hotel is close to Copenhagen's well-known attractions, with Gemini Residence only moments on foot from the property. Tivoli Gardens, Kobenhavns Radhus and Nyhavn are a short drive away.Revato

name: Cph Studio Hotel
description: Set 5 km from Copenhagen Central Station, CPH Studio Hotel features a restaurant, on-site bar and free WiFi. Oresund and Amager Strand metro stations are both a 5-minute walk away. Amager Strand beach is about a 10-minute walk away. All rooms feature Danish design furnishings from HAY, and come with a 40-inch TV. Some rooms have a kitchenette with a fridge and electric stovetop. Each room is equipped with a private bathroom. There is luggage storage space at the property. CPH Studio Hotel also offers bike hire. Kongens Nytorv and Nyhavn can be reached within 15-minutes by metro. Copenhagen Airport is only 9-minutes away by metro.

name: Moxy Copenhagen Sydhavnen
description: Hello gorgeous. Moxy Hotels is here to realize your idea of hotel living in Copenhagen. Located in the up-and-coming neighborhood of Sydhavnen, we are adding some guts to the business community. Enter your room keylessly with the Marriott® app, then revel in abundant USB plugins, free lightning-fast Wi-Fi, a 43” TV with Chromecast, air-conditioning, and designer bath amenities. Oh, and we're on top of the game when it comes to sustainability, so for all eco-conscious travelers looking for a green hotel in Copenhagen, pink is the new green! Moxy is truly an energetic alternative to the typical hotel experience, proving that affordability doesn’t mean sacrificing style and comfort when traveling to Copenhagen. In the Pickup, you can get convenient meals while we serve up local brews at the Moxy Bar. Enjoy it all in our social spaces for co-working and play. The Crew is ready to mix what you love, point you in the direction of more, and give you insider advice on what you must see and do in Copenhagen.Marriott

name: Adina Apartment Hotel Copenhagen
description: Adina Apartment Hotel Copenhagen is situated in Copenhagen and is close to the area's popular attractions. It provides an indoor pool, a sauna and complimentary wireless internet. The apartments at Adina Apartments Copenhagen offer a mini bar, a private balcony and a refrigerator. For those who wish to cook independently, there is a kitchen that is conveniently equipped with a dishwasher, kitchenware and a microwave. Those staying at the property can wake up to a satisfying breakfast prepared every morning, before leaving Adina Apartment Hotel Copenhagen to explore the surrounding region. Adina Apartments Copenhagen is close to Osterport Station, making it easy for guests to discover Copenhagen and its surrounding areas. Tivoli Gardens is just an easy drive from the property.Revato

name: Scandic Sluseholmen
description: Just 500 metres from Sydhavnen Harbour, Scandic Sluseholmen offers room service, satellite TV and free WiFi. All rooms at Scandic Sluseholmen have multi-channel TVs, spacious work areas. Some provide city and harbour views. The Bar offers snacks and drinks, occasional piano music and live sport on flat-screen TVs. Restaurant Elements serves a popular breakfast buffet that includes fresh fruit and healthy, homemade bread. Copenhagen city centre is 5 km from the hotel. Copenhagen International Airport is a 10-minute drive away.

name: Hotel Skt. Annæ
address: Sankt Annæ Plads 18-20, 1250 Copenhagen, Capital Region
description: This boutique hotel is housed in buildings dating back to the 17th century and is located in a central yet quiet area. Nyhavn Harbour is just around the corner and Kongens Nytorv Metro Station is 500 metres away. The rooftop Garden offers views of Copenhagen. The modern rooms feature a stylish Copenhagen design, a TV, minibar and a private bathroom, including a hairdryer and organic toiletries. The on-site restaurant The Shrimp offers a selection of American and seafood dishes and an extensive wine list. Guests can also unwind in the lounge with a cocktail and snacks from the adjoining Bar, The Club. Guests can rent bicycles at the reception to explore Copenhagen. Within 5 minutes walk from the hotel is Amalienborg Castle and the Royal Danish Theatre. Central bus routes are right by the property.iHotelier/iStay

name: Zleep Hotel Copenhagen Airport
description: Located within 5 minutes’ drive of Copenhagen Airport and the Bella Center, this hotel offers free WiFi and free private parking. All rooms have a flat-screen TV. This hotel was originally built in the 1970s and offers 105 rooms of various sizes. The reception incorporates a cosy café environment with 24 hour guest service. For a surcharge, guests can enjoy Zleep Hotel Copenhagen Airport's organic breakfast. A bus stop is found within a 10-minute walk from Zleep Hotel Copenhagen Airport and reaches central Copenhagen in about 30 minutes. Tårnby Train Station is 20 minutes’ walk away. We do not offer a shuttle service from or to the airport.

name: Hotel Ottilia by Brøchner Hotels
description: Situated in the Carlsberg district of Copenhagen, this luxury boutique hotel offers multiple shared lounges, bars and restaurants. Featuring a complimentary wine hour for all guests, Hotel Ottilia by Brøchner Hotels has high-speed WiFi throughout the property. All rooms come with high-speed WiFi, a flat-screen TV and free toiletries. Hotel Ottilia by Brøchner Hotels boasts an Italian restaurant located on the top floor, with a 360 degree view of Copenhagen. An organic breakfast is available for guests. The hotel offers 10 different meeting rooms and conference halls in all sizes, fit for every group from 2 to 120 people. Bike rentals are available on the property. Copenhagen Zoo is a 15-minute walk from the hotel, while Tivoli Gardens is 2.8 km away. Copenhagen Central Station is 2.5 km from Hotel Ottilia by Brøchner Hotels.

name: Nimb Hotel
description: Located in Copenhagen’s famous Tivoli Gardens, this stylish boutique hotel is housed in an impressive Moorish-style building. It offers on-site dining and designer rooms with flat-screen TVs and park views. Elegant rooms with antique furniture and four-poster beds are featured in all Nimb Hotel rooms. Each bathroom has a double sink and shower. Luxury toiletries and guest bathrobes are also included. Selected rooms feature a fireplace and a free-standing bathtub. The restaurant Nimb Brasserie offer Tivoli Gardens views. Guests can enjoy seasonal Scandinavian dishes and French cuisine. Grilled delicacies with an Asian touch are available at Bar'n'Grill. Featuring décor by Hans J Wegner, the bar serves afternoon tea and great coffee in the daylight hours. When the clock strikes 17, the talented bartenders mix splendid cocktails in the historic ballroom complete with chandeliers and a log fire. Nimb Hotel can help arrange private limousine service to and from Copenhagen Airport, which is 8 km away.

name: Next House Copenhagen
description: Conveniently set in the centre of Copenhagen, Next House Copenhagen provides air-conditioned rooms, a garden, free WiFi and a shared lounge. Featuring a shared kitchen, this property also welcomes guests with a restaurant and a terrace. Guests can make use of a bar. All units at the hostel are equipped with a private bathroom and bed linen. Guests at Next House Copenhagen can enjoy a buffet breakfast. You can play mini-golf at the accommodation, and the area is popular for cycling. Speaking Danish, English, Spanish and Italian, staff will be happy to provide guests with practical guidance on the area at the reception. Popular points of interest near Next House Copenhagen include Tivoli Gardens, Ny Carlsberg Glyptotek and Copenhagen Central Station. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 7 km from the hostel.

name: Bryggen Guldsmeden
description: Bryggen Guldsmeden has a fitness centre, garden, a shared lounge and terrace in Copenhagen. This 4-star hotel offers a bar. The hotel features a sauna, a 24-hour front desk and free WiFi throughout the property. At the hotel, the rooms are equipped with a desk, a flat-screen TV, a private bathroom, bed linen and towels. Every room has a safety deposit box, while some rooms also feature a balcony and others also feature pool views. All guest rooms feature a wardrobe. Guests at Bryggen Guldsmeden can enjoy a vegetarian breakfast. At the accommodation you will find a restaurant serving European cuisine. Vegetarian, dairy-free and vegan options can also be requested. Popular points of interest near Bryggen Guldsmeden include Church of Our Saviour, The National Museum of Denmark and Danish Royal Library. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 6 km from the hotel.

name: Axel Guldsmeden
description: Experience the charm of our lovely eco-friendly hotel, ideally located in the heart of Copenhagen's vibrant Vesterbro district. Our property is a favorite among sustainability-minded travelers who appreciate our commitment to the environment. Nestled in Vesterbro, just moments away from Tivoli Gardens and Copenhagen Central Station, Axel Guldsmeden offers a cozy and enchanting atmosphere that combines Nordic and Balinese design elements in our signature Guldsmeden style. Step into our hotel and enter an world of magic and tranquility. Relaxation awaits you at Axel Guldsmeden, with our rejuvenating spa and a courtyard that feels like a lush jungle oasis. Whether you're here for leisure or business, we have you covered. Our facilities include a restaurant, bar, and conference spaces, ensuring a comfortable and convenient stay for all our guests. We take pride in our eco-friendly initiatives and have received certifications from Green Globe and Green Key, reflecting our commitment to sustainability. With 212 rooms, including four exquisite penthouse suites boasting private rooftop terraces and hot tubs, we offer accommodation options for every preference. Make sure to carve out some time to pamper yourself at the Axel Spa, a serene oasis within our hotel. Join our welcoming Axel family in the lounge and courtyard, where you can unwind and connect with fellow guests. Before you set out to explore the vibrant and green wonders of Copenhagen, indulge in our completely organic Guldsmeden signature breakfast. Savor the flavors and fuel up for an unforgettable day in the city. Rest assured, you won't feel hungry again until evening! Experience the magic of Axel Guldsmeden, where sustainability, comfort, and unique design come together to create a truly exceptional stay in Copenhagen's Vesterbro district.

name: Manon Les Suites Guldsmeden
description: Featuring an organic breakfast buffet, this hotel is situated 1 km from Copenhagen Central Station. Each spacious suite has a flat-screen TV. The hotel features a rooftop restaurant. WiFi is free. All apartments at Manon Les Suites feature a four-poster bed as well as a kitchenette with a fridge and coffee/tea facilities. Organic toiletries are available in the private bathroom. A fitness room and indoor pool are free to access for all guests. Manon Les Suites is a 7-minute walk from Vesterport Train Station, while the local bus stops just 140 metres away. The main shopping street, Strøget, and Tivoli Gardens are both within a 10-minute walk of the hotel.

name: Absalon Hotel
description: This family-run hotel is in the vibrant Vesterbro district, within 5 minutes’ walk of Copenhagen Central Station and Tivoli Gardens. It offers bicycle rentals and a popular Scandinavian breakfast buffet. Featuring colourful décor by Designers Guild, Absalon’s modern rooms feature a desk and flat-screen TV with cable channels. A fridge and safety deposit box are also included. Danish pastries, gluten-free bread and tasty marmalade are just some of the breakfast options offered. Guests can enjoy afternoon coffee or a refreshing drink in the lobby or the hotel courtyard. Close to the popular Kødbyen neighbourhood (Meatpacking District), there are plenty of trendy bars and restaurants nearby, which staff will happily recommend.

name: Andersen Boutique Hotel
description: Set in the trendy Vesterbro district, this boutique hotel is just 200 m from Copenhagen Central Station. It offers modern, design rooms with LED TVs and free Wi-Fi. Andersen Boutique Hotel provides stylish rooms with décor by award-winning company Designers Guild. Each room has soundproofed windows, a shower and Molton Brown toiletries. All feature a minibar, desk and safe. Vesterbro is a great choice for travellers interested in shopping, food and museums.#The property will be going through renovation works from Sun 01 Jan 2017 until Fri 07 Apr 2017. During this period, guests may experience some noise or light disturbances, and some hotel facilities and services may not be available.Expedia

name: Cph Hotel
description: Next to the trendy Kødbyen district, CPH Hotel is less than 1 km from City Hall Square. All rooms have cable TV and free WiFi. The Scandinavian-style rooms at CPH Hotel have wooden floors and light, spacious bathrooms with hair dryers. Room furnishings include a work desk and an armchair. Guests can enjoy breakfast at the outdoor terrace during the summer months. Tivoli Gardens and Copenhagen Central Station are a 4-minute walk from the hotel. Copenhagen International Airport is 20 minutes from the hotel by train.

name: Hotel Mayfair
description: Hotel Mayfair is located only 5 minutes from Copenhagen Central Station, so whether you take the train or taxi from the airport you are greeted at the reception 20 minutes later.Regardless of the room you book, itll meet your most important needs. Take off your shoes and relax on the bed, or connect to our Google Chromecast to stream your own content. Should you prefer a livelier setting, you can settle in our cozy lounge or sunny courtyard. At Hotel Mayfair we enjoy a good breakfast, thats why our new breakfast buffet is focused on organic, homemade & healthy products. You can expect creamy scrambled eggs, fresh juice, crispy bacon, high quality cold cuts and of course coffee. We also work with a local bakery, so we always have freshly baked sourdough bread ready for you in the morning.With our location at inner Vesterbro, youre a short walk from top restaurants, Tivoli and the popular Meatpacking district which is full of places to eat, art galleries and bars. We are always more than happy to help with recommendations and reservations.iHotelier/iStay

name: Kurhotel Skodsborg
description: Kurhotel Skodsborg offers two restaurants on site and free parking. The spa features a sauna and hot tub. A wide range of massage, spa and beauty treatments can also be booked. Copenhagen is just a 20 minutes' drive away. At Kurhotel Skodsborg, all rooms include a TV, seating area and private bathroom. WiFi is free. The sea-view restaurant offers modern Nordic fine dining with seasonal ingredients, herbs from the garden and freshly-baked breads. The comprehensive wine list completes the dining experience. The Brasserie offers more casual dining yet still focused on local produce. In the lobby, guests can take a coffee break, browse the reading collection or simply relax. Bicycles can be rented on site. Skodsborg Strand Park is 250 metres away. Skodsborg Station is a 10-minute walk from Skodsborg Kurhotel.

name: Fairfield by Marriott Copenhagen Nordhavn
description: No description found

name: Daniel & Jacobs Boutique Apartments By the Beach Trail
description: Set within 600 metres of Amager Strandpark and 2.7 km of Kastrup Søbad Beach in Copenhagen, Jacob & Daniels Boutique Apartments offers accommodation with seating area. Complimentary WiFi is offeredthroughout the property. The units come with parquet floors and feature a fully equipped kitchen with a dishwasher, a dining area, a flat-screen TV with streaming services, and a private bathroom with shower and a hair dryer. An oven, a microwave and toaster are also featured, as well as a coffee machine and a kettle. Guests at the aparthotel can enjoy an à la carte or a vegetarian breakfast. Church of Our Saviour is 2.8 km from Jacob & Daniels Boutique Apartments, while Christiansborg Palace is 3.5 km away. The nearest airport is Copenhagen Airport, 5 km from the accommodation.

name: Hotel d'Angleterre
description: Rooms Treat yourself to a stay in one of the 92 guestrooms, featuring heated floors and LCD televisions. Cable television is provided for your entertainment. Conveniences include phones, as well as laptop-compatible safes and desks. Amenities Pamper yourself with a visit to the spa, which offers massages, body treatments, and facials. You can take advantage of recreational amenities such as a 24-hour health club, an indoor pool, and a steam room. Additional features at this hotel include complimentary wireless Internet access, concierge services, and babysitting (surcharge). Business}, Other Amenities Featured amenities include complimentary newspapers in the lobby, dry cleaning/laundry services, and a 24-hour front desk. Planning an event in Copenhagen? This hotel has facilities measuring 8159 square feet (758 square meters), including conference space. Self parking (subject to charges) is available onsite. Property Location D'Angleterre, Copenhagen is centrally located in Copenhagen, a 2-minute walk from Nyhavn and 9 minutes by foot from Rosenborg Castle. This 5-star hotel is 0.9 mi (1.5 km) from Amalienborg Palace and 1 mi (1.6 km) from City Hall Square. Dining Wrap up your day with a drink at the bar/lounge. Buffet breakfasts are served on weekdays from 7:00 AM to 10:30 AM for a fee. Optional Charges Fee for buffet breakfast: approximately DKK 350 for adults and DKK 175 for children Covered self parking fee: DKK 650 per day Covered valet parking fee: DKK 650 per day Rollaway bed fee: DKK 500.0 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 3:00 PM Checkin end at anytime The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed Be prepared: check the latest COVID-19 travel requirements and measures in place for this destination before you travel. Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets not allowed Service animals are allowed Service animals are exempt from fees/restrictions General instructions Essential workers only - NO Property is cleaned with disinfectant Guests are provided with free hand sanitizer Property confirms they are implementing enhanced cleaning measures Staff temperature checks are conducted regularly Commonly-touched surfaces are cleaned with disinfectant Property confirms they are implementing guest safety measuresViajes Exito Hotels
